attributes.body: Terry Pratchett was a funny man who wrote books full of wit, humour, and talking hats! Ever heard of Discworld? He dreamed it all up!
attributes.description: Meet Terry Pratchett, the chap who brought laughter to books. Voici Terry Pratchett, le gars qui a apporté le rire dans les livres.

attributes.body: Terry Pratchett was the guy who wrote more than 70 books! His most famous series, Discworld, has 41 books in itself!

attributes.body: Terry Pratchett had an immense talent for writing stories that both children and adults could enjoy. He's best known for his Discworld series.
attributes.description: Say hello to Terry Pratchett, a brilliant storyteller. Dites bonjour à Terry Pratchett, un conteur brillant.
